title: Bump three from 0.87.1 to 0.113.2

labels.name: dependencies
labels.description: Pull requests that update a dependency file

body:
Bumps [three](https://github.com/mrdoob/three.js) from 0.87.1 to 0.113.2.
Release notes

Sourced from three's releases.

r41/ROME

(265.317 KB, gzip: 64.849 KB)

(Up to this point, some RO.ME specific features managed to get in the lib. The aim is to clean this up in next revisions.)

  • Improved Blender Object and Scene exporters. (@alteredq)
  • Fixes on WebGL attributes. (@alteredq and @empaempa)
  • Reduced overall memory footprint. (@mrdoob)
  • Added Face4 support to CollisionSystem. (@NINE78)
  • Added Blender 2.57 exporter. (@remoe)
  • Added Particle support to Ray. (@mrdoob and @jaycrossler)
  • Improved Ray.intersectObject performance by checking boundingSphere first. (@mrdoob)
  • Added TrackballCamera. (@egraether)
  • Added repeat and offset properties to Texture. (@mrdoob and @alteredq)
  • Cleaned up Vector2, Vector3 and Vector4. (@egraether)
Commits
  • See full diff in compare view

[![Dependabot compatibility score](https://api.dependabot.com/badges/compatibility_score?dependency-name=three&package-manager=npm_and_yarn&previous-version=0.87.1&new-version=0.113.2)](https://dependabot.com/compatibility-score.html?dependency-name=three&package-manager=npm_and_yarn&previous-version=0.87.1&new-version=0.113.2) Dependabot will resolve any conflicts with this PR as long as you don't alter it yourself. You can also trigger a rebase manually by commenting `@dependabot rebase`. [//]: # (dependabot-automerge-start) [//]: # (dependabot-automerge-end) ---

title: Bump webpack from 3.12.0 to 4.41.5

labels.name: dependencies
labels.description: Pull requests that update a dependency file

body:
Bumps [webpack](https://github.com/webpack/webpack) from 3.12.0 to 4.41.5.
Release notes

Sourced from webpack's releases.

v4.41.5

Bugfixes

  • handle relative paths with webpack:// prefix in SourceMaps correctly
  • fixes a non-determinism about providedExports with export * which caused changing module hashes and unnecessary HMR invalidation

v4.41.4

Bugfixes

  • fix case where __webpack_require__.e is not a function when using module concatenation
  • fix incorrect imported module when using sideEffects in a certain constellation of export names

Performance

  • lazy-require Webassembly related modules for improved startup performance

v4.41.3

Security

  • force upgrade terser-webpack-plugin dependency for security fix (not affecting webpack)

Funding

  • add npm funding field to package.json

v4.41.2

Bugfixes

  • fix issue with invalide timezone

v4.41.1

Bugfixes

  • fix incorrect request shortening when directory looks similar to parent directory
  • fix crash when timezone is unknown

v4.41.0

Developer Experience

  • disallow cache group named test with shorthand syntax to point out a potential config error

Performance

  • Improve performance of LimitChunkCountPlugin

v4.40.3

Bugfixes

  • fix a bug that the HMR plugin affected child compilations
... (truncated)
Commits
  • 45ecebc 4.41.5
  • 8a0dac1 Merge pull request #10185 from webpack/bugfix/non-deterministic-provided-exports
  • 4e31587 Merge pull request #10183 from webpack/deps/update
  • 3ec952f update dependencies in-range
  • 8e4749e make order of exports in providedExports deterministic
  • 0e5e8d9 Merge pull request #10181 from webpack/backport/webpack-source-map-prefix
  • 6b9884e handle webpack:// prefix in SourceMap sources
  • dcc45dd 4.41.4
  • ab4fa8d Merge pull request #10146 from liximomo/fix-sideEffects
  • 1452d19 test: add test case
  • Additional commits viewable in compare view

[![Dependabot compatibility score](https://api.dependabot.com/badges/compatibility_score?dependency-name=webpack&package-manager=npm_and_yarn&previous-version=3.12.0&new-version=4.41.5)](https://dependabot.com/compatibility-score.html?dependency-name=webpack&package-manager=npm_and_yarn&previous-version=3.12.0&new-version=4.41.5) Dependabot will resolve any conflicts with this PR as long as you don't alter it yourself. title: Update aphrodite requirement from ^1.2.4 to ^2.4.0

labels.name: dependencies
labels.description: Pull requests that update a dependency file

body:
Updates the requirements on [aphrodite](https://github.com/Khan/aphrodite) to permit the latest version.
Changelog *Sourced from [aphrodite's changelog](https://github.com/Khan/aphrodite/blob/v2.4.0/CHANGELOG.md).* > # 2.4.0 > > - Allow already injected to be reset ([#380](https://github-redirect.dependabot.com/Khan/aphrodite/pull/380)) > - Add TypeScript export for flushToStyleTag ([#379](https://github-redirect.dependabot.com/Khan/aphrodite/pull/379)) > - Make parameter typings for StyleSheet.create more typed ([#375](https://github-redirect.dependabot.com/Khan/aphrodite/pull/375)) > - Add a more explicit error message when someone tries to pass a plain object instead of a stylesheet into the css() method ([#349](https://github-redirect.dependabot.com/Khan/aphrodite/pull/349)) > - Roll up inline-style-prefixer ([#364](https://github-redirect.dependabot.com/Khan/aphrodite/pull/364)) > - Update inline-style-prefixer 5.0.4 → 5.1.0 ([#373](https://github-redirect.dependabot.com/Khan/aphrodite/pull/373)) > - Fix examples ([#367](https://github-redirect.dependabot.com/Khan/aphrodite/pull/367)) > > # 2.3.1 > > - Use deep import for inline-style-prefixer ([#363](https://github-redirect.dependabot.com/Khan/aphrodite/pull/363)) > > # 2.3.0 > > - Bump inline-style-prefixer 4.0.2 -> 5.0.4 ([#358](https://github-redirect.dependabot.com/Khan/aphrodite/pull/358)) > - Update rollup to v1.2.0 and babel to v7 ([#362](https://github-redirect.dependabot.com/Khan/aphrodite/pull/362)) > > # 2.2.3 > > - Bump inline-style-prefixer 4.0.0 -> 4.0.2 ([#341](https://github-redirect.dependabot.com/Khan/aphrodite/pull/341)) > > # 2.2.2 > > - Fix multiple `@font-face` of the same name ([#327](https://github-redirect.dependabot.com/Khan/aphrodite/pull/327)) > - Fix typings to allow for extending ([#330](https://github-redirect.dependabot.com/Khan/aphrodite/pull/330)) > > # 2.2.1 > > - Use code-splitting for default and no-important builds ([#325](https://github-redirect.dependabot.com/Khan/aphrodite/pull/325)) > > # 2.2.0 > > - Expose `defaultSelectorHandlers` and `injectAndGetClassName` ([#320](https://github-redirect.dependabot.com/Khan/aphrodite/pull/320)) > > > # 2.1.1 > > - Add `minify` and `flushToStyleTag` to no-important ([#316](https://github-redirect.dependabot.com/Khan/aphrodite/pull/316)) > > # 2.1.0 > > - Expose `flushToStyleTag` ([#310](https://github-redirect.dependabot.com/Khan/aphrodite/pull/310)) > > # 2.0.0 > > - Selector handlers now must return an array of rules. Returning a string containing multiple rules is deprecated. The fallback behavior for selector handlers that still return strings is to use media queries, which are not supported in older browsers like Internet Explorer 8, which makes this a breaking change. If you find yourself seeing this warning, you need to update your custom selector handlers to return arrays of strings instead of plain strings. This fallback will be removed entirely in a future major release. > - `insertRule` is now used to inject styles to the style element ([#240](https://github-redirect.dependabot.com/Khan/aphrodite/pull/240)) > - New `minify()` controls the minification of style names (defaults to `true` when `process.env.NODE_ENV === 'production'`) ([#291](https://github-redirect.dependabot.com/Khan/aphrodite/pull/291)) > ... (truncated)
Commits - [`a76eae3`](https://github.com/Khan/aphrodite/commit/a76eae3c212ca9c7a9b4f1c02b894438eb6e87a0) 2.4.0 - [`ff0be80`](https://github.com/Khan/aphrodite/commit/ff0be8070815a14416a1ba896496af93abc3a9eb) Update changelog for 2.4.0 - [`dc4269a`](https://github.com/Khan/aphrodite/commit/dc4269a9d66cd270b746d9a1fd58320e1e42b9be) Make parameter typings for StyleSheet.create more typed ([#375](https://github-redirect.dependabot.com/Khan/aphrodite/issues/375)) - [`e53f34d`](https://github.com/Khan/aphrodite/commit/e53f34d38f3e6ae271746d3705f90ee88f58c337) Add Typescript export for flushToStyleTag ([#379](https://github-redirect.dependabot.com/Khan/aphrodite/issues/379)) - [`06a881b`](https://github.com/Khan/aphrodite/commit/06a881b387656f0b5f08ab6997373e78d0c1a1f9) Allow already injected to be reset ([#380](https://github-redirect.dependabot.com/Khan/aphrodite/issues/380)) - [`bf95d9f`](https://github.com/Khan/aphrodite/commit/bf95d9feab9744acd949cb79548ae46819edd20f) Update inline-style-prefixer 5.0.4 → 5.1.0 ([#373](https://github-redirect.dependabot.com/Khan/aphrodite/issues/373)) - [`1211bea`](https://github.com/Khan/aphrodite/commit/1211bea177d7fc8887d49dd308bcf00826ccbebe) Clearer error message ([#349](https://github-redirect.dependabot.com/Khan/aphrodite/issues/349)) - [`1beabca`](https://github.com/Khan/aphrodite/commit/1beabca0947a9311fa9a9c533f8f41d005f2935f) Fix examples, fixes [#366](https://github-redirect.dependabot.com/Khan/aphrodite/issues/366) ([#367](https://github-redirect.dependabot.com/Khan/aphrodite/issues/367)) - [`cf83722`](https://github.com/Khan/aphrodite/commit/cf83722a1852b3962c45a08997c1ac80babf28eb) Roll up inline-style-prefixer ([#364](https://github-redirect.dependabot.com/Khan/aphrodite/issues/364)) - [`833eec3`](https://github.com/Khan/aphrodite/commit/833eec329d489ba6f6e41b1002ef4b8a89863da9) 2.3.1 - Additional commits viewable in [compare view](https://github.com/Khan/aphrodite/compare/v1.2.4...v2.4.0)
